name: SpookySwap
intro: Decentralized exchange on the Fantom Opera network
introduce: SpookySwap is an automated market-making (AMM) decentralized exchange (DEX) for the Fantom Opera network. SpookySwap’s priority is to be trader-first, community-governed, and self-sufficient. SpookySwap intends to build tools such as trading charts, order history, and more in order for users to receive the richest trading experience as well as establish a fully functional DAO to govern the future of the protocol.
